name: Proof of Valor
loreDescription: "Though courage and daring may not be visible to mortal eyes, this insignia will act as proof of yours. From now on, everyone, you meet shall know of your valor."

skillDescription.base: Decreases damage taken by 15.0%. Effect decreases by 1.5% with each attack suffered, down to 7.5%. Only the strongest damage reduction effect is applied. This Artifact can only apply to one Hero within a party.
skillDescription.max: Decreases damage taken by 30.0%. Effect decreases by 3.0% with each attack suffered, down to 15.0%. Only the strongest damage reduction effect is applied. This Artifact can only apply to one Hero within a party.
